name: Lunar Fields
description:
Created by Lucas Bellotto

Lunar Fields is a singleplayer videogame about growing magic plants to your advantage.  Defeat the moon wizard with all of your plant abilities to win.

WASD - move

On the field you will see an arrow. From which, you can do either of the following

Keyboard: Z (A), Plant
Keyboard X (B) , Harvest

Tips:

  • Each plant reacts differently based on the moon phase. Keep an eye out the next time you plant something or are in combat
  • Each plant gives different stat abilities like an attack boost
  • There is an old wizard in the starting area that will tell you the phase of the moon immediately
